/1/: Name of MIWG, this will be used to name the minified file
/2/: stamp version number on minified file
/3/: name of game css file including exstension
/6/: path to the folder holding main source including index.html etc
/7/: path to src if not called 'src'
/9/: Loader version get a list of all available loaders from the help site
/10/: Use these if you have been asked to change the size of the game window
/11/: These values should match those put into GTH when uploading
/15/: the latest version of soundjs can be added to the server on request, this can be kept up to date by changing the file name
/16/: set to false to not load soundjs
/18/: Send a copy of the newly minified src folder to this path.
/19/: set this to true is your game is compiled prior to building (e.g. webpack).
/20/: This will package the imports, audio and images
